description_for_model: Data search, exploration and enrichment for Algorand blockchain. Words 'Algorand', 'Algo','account', 'transaction', 'application', 'asset', 'acc', 'txn', 'asa' or 'app' or alphanumeric uppercase 58 character strings or 52 character strings in prompt trigger this API!
description_for_human: Algorand blockchain explorer and search with enriched augmented data.  Built by GoPlausible!
